bibl.title: People in Greek Documentary Papyri: First Results of a Research Project.
bibl.note: Describes the historical development of the structure of the 'People' database integrated in the Trismegistos platform. - I. Introduction. - II. The people database: history and structure: 1. The prosopographical structure (Prosopographia Ptolemaica); - 2. The onomastic structure. - III. Automated record collection from a full-text corpus: 1. The full-text corpus; - 2. Named entity recognition: commercial vs. custom-made software; - 3. The procedure for onomastic and prosopographical filtering. - IV. First results: 1. The number of name occurrences and its evolution; - 2. The number of names and the communality of rare names. - V. Future prospects.
bibl.seg: DEPAUW Mark and Bart VAN BEEK, People in Greek Documentary Papyri: First Results of a Research Project.

Describes the historical development of the structure of the 'People' database integrated in the Trismegistos platform. - I. Introduction. - II. The people database: history and structure: 1. The prosopographical structure (Prosopographia Ptolemaica); - 2. The onomastic structure. - III. Automated record collection from a full-text corpus: 1. The full-text corpus; - 2. Named entity recognition: commercial vs. custom-made software; - 3. The procedure for onomastic and prosopographical filtering. - IV. First results: 1. The number of name occurrences and its evolution; - 2. The number of names and the communality of rare names. - V. Future prospects.
